comment: Worst app ever. I do not recommend. DO NOT SIGN UP FOR TRAINER+. They will keep charging you even after you cancel service

author: Teri Hughes
comment: Let's you build your workout and guides you thru it. Excellent feature for rehab. Only downside, you have to get off the couch for the workout to have impact... Lol

author: Anna Gillihan
comment: It's a great app for Android phones. You can search for easy to hard exercises with or without weights etc.

author: Johnathan Stewart
comment: Easy to use and takes the over thinking out of training.

author: Kim Camp
comment: Good interface, easy to use and customise

author: Janice Hinds
comment: Awesome app I am seeing my results using the kettle bell exercise and cardio.

author: Simona Sas
comment: Great!

author: chrystal kromidas
comment: I have tried several apps and this is by far the best.   Its like having a personal trainer.  If I want to work out at home it has tons of choices.  You can also work out at the gym, on machines and do yoga. The only complaint is it does not link with my Google fit app.   But other than that its the best

Great app if you have a lot of money to spend. There are "free workouts" but their not as rewarding. I do like that it's compatible with Google Fit. I purchased the full version of a different fitness app awhile ago, but keep my eye out for new ones.

author: Igor Janković
comment: Great app so far, but I have one problem and one suggestion. Heart rate is not tracked very well. It doesn't show up for every exercise inside the workout. Also, you should add some pause with explanation of next upcoming exercise so I can prepare my self for it. Currently, next exercise starts immediately and I don't have enough time to prepare myself (take dumbbells, yoga mat or anything else). And the price should be cheaper than it is.

author: Geoff Ashton
comment: Just started using app. It is way better and more functional, for what I was looking for, than any other app I have tried. Very convenient to set up a custom workout. Easy to reorganize to your liking by moving excerise up or down, changing time or reps and copying an excercise. The following are suggestions I would like to see in future updates. Quickly I hope. 1. Be able to add any single excercise found in app to a list. From my created list be able to move excercise to a workout. Currently you need to create a workout. I just want to start a database of excercises I am interested in and move them to where I want. 2. Be able to sort or move created workouts anywhere in the list. If you create a workout for say for Wednesday and then a create one for Monday, the first created workout is at the top of the list. It would be nice to be able to organize the created workout list in the order which you want it. 3. When creating a workout have more options on cover photos. Eg. Monday's workout is shoulders and back. Have pictures of muscle groups you can add as well as pictures of excercises. 4. Why does every created workout say legs under the cover photo? I cannot remove this. It is distracting if you want your workout to show a different muscle group or body part for that day. 5. To be continued. Developer feel free to send me an email 😊

author: Heidi So
comment: I have been using this app for 5 years now. Reading through the reviews I feel most users do not understand all the options they have and the full potential this app offers. Tried several fitness apps, this is the one I stuck with. I train 5-6 days a week. Always with this app. I have created my own workout collections, programs etc on here. They even let you use your own photos and workout descriptions. A lot of workouts on there are free, but I still subscribe to Pro+, because I feel the  need to give back to this app. It has become the only social media platform for me now and my only fitness app. From Yoga to MMA to Crossfit, Tabata, Functional Training, Rock-climbing , weight lifting... You name it, they got it.. A great organizing tool, whether you're a beginner or Pro (like myself). Their admin support is awesome. I absolutely love it and I am fitter than ever, have made friends with great people, much of it thanks to this great workout tool.  Love this app!!!!

author: Elizabeth Cooney
comment: It's good but but didn't like the calender...wanted to be able to move workouts to suit my schedule. Wanted a month over view. Not easy to use and look at weight progression.

I love the idea of this app, but I'm not loving the app itself. I can't find quite a few exercises that I'm trying to add to my routine. And of the exercises I CAN find, they aren't as easy to setup as I would hope. For instance, I added Hack Squats (no exercise for the machine) but can't specify the weight to use. I can only use "light,medium,heavy" as opposed to "25lbs,10lbs,etc".  I also can't figure out how to easily do sets of reps. If I'm doing 4 sets of 12 reps before moving to the next exercise, how do I do it? It seems to revolve around one set of reps per exercise.

Been using this app for close to 3 weeks now and I absolutely love it! It walks you through every step and gives a great workout. It also offers a great variety of exercises especially when you want to switch it up.

author: Eric Smith
comment: I use this app everyday and it helps keep me motivated to do my yoga my jogging and my workout in general.  Once I got familiar with it I love the idea that I could create my own workouts and then share them with my friends.  I highly recommend this app for anyone looking to change their lives and who needs a helping hand.

author: Daniel Rieger
comment: Seemed like a good app, great because it works on the gear S3, but when I tried creating my set for workout it doesn't have ANY machine exercises. I searched the whole "full gym" category. What kind of "full gym" doesn't have 1 machine exercise? And to create my own I need to pay 79 dollars a year? No thanks

author: Iman Mahmood
comment: I love this app. Lots of free option. The only thing I wish if they have preview of the workout before it actually starts.

author: Brandy Albin
comment: Needs to be able download workouts to watch without the phone with cues on the watch. Microsoft band is awesome about that... once that is done it would 5 stars. It would not really be that hard to male this fix

author: Sky Vibez
comment: This is my favorite workout app ever! My opinion- None of the others even compare! I always use this app no matter what kind of exercise I want to do! And I always see results and am always satisfied! I also try to recommend this app to everyone I know because of how much I Love Skimble!

author: Khushboo Damani
comment: I want to cancel my subscription and it is almost impossible to do it

author: TheNickelbeee
comment: I have purchased 5 or 6 routines.  Now they won't show up as purchased...this is a very disappointing app indead...buyer beware, they steal.

author: Delilah Wilson
comment: This app has helped me go from flab to fab and I didn't even know how to work out before

author: Dee Dee Heberling
comment: Love this app because there are workouts for beginners and experts. You can also choose workouts based on how much time you have. You can schedule workouts and set reminders. It really helps me stick to my goals. Easy to do from home or on the go.
Loved the app until I realized it doesn't transfer HR data to S-health. Why track it if it doesn't transfer. Need to fix!

author: Arika Lilley
comment: THE BEST workout app I've tried!! Love it love it. Thanks guys!

author: Craig Vansciver
comment: Auto charged me for a subscription I did not want or ask for.

author: Bernadette May
comment: This app is great. I can find workouts 10 min to an hour, depending on how much time I have to work out. And they really work!

author: Felesha M
comment: App is awesome! Although to get personalized training and customized plans you have to purchase the upgraded version not bad pricing though.

author: Manu Guitton
comment: Very good and comprehensive app to train at home for beginners or more experienced athletes

author: spencer1001100
comment: The work outs are okay but for more advanced people I don't recommend it

author: sarita nair
comment: Awesome been using it for years. Especially great for interval training

author: Dark Wolf
comment: Great app if you are willing to spend loads of $$$$. I found a couple of free exercises but not worth them.

author: Jeff Williams
comment: I like the guided nature. Not sure about the 7 bucks a month though

author: Karen Bergeson
comment: I uninstalled because there is no transition time between exercises.

author: A Google User
comment: One of my favorite gym app. Really good Android Wear support. Lots of content for beginners to advance.

author: Edgar Chávez
comment: Great collection of exercises and routines. Nice interface.

author: Abu Yunus Toshqandiy
comment: No option to choose men or women only trainers

author: Brian Lashinski
comment: Wish you could track your weight also

author: Eric masaki
comment: Great app. Even without pro. Very customizable to different levels. Good verbal training / tips.
